info.title: Track AI Costs
info.description: CaeliCrawler uses AI models for document analysis, Smart Query, and the assistant. Each request consumes tokens that incur costs. Your budget shows current usage. When the limit is reached, AI functions are blocked - request an increase in time or contact your administrator.

llm.clickForDetails: Click for details and limit increase
llm.requestedLimitHint: Enter the desired monthly limit in USD
llm.reasonHint: Please explain why you need an increase (min. 10 characters)
llm.reasonTooShort: Reason must be at least 10 characters
llm.mustBeGreaterThanCurrent: Must be greater than current limit
llm.requestSubmitted: Your request has been submitted successfully
llm.pendingRequestExists: You already have a pending request
llm.adminSelfService: As an administrator, you can update your limit directly
llm.adminLimitHint: Set your monthly budget limit in USD
llm.limitUpdated: Your limit has been updated successfully
